title: Monster Girls Back to School

thumbnailDetails.alt: Monster Girls Back to School Game Free Online Game

headings.text: What is Monster Girls Back to School?
How to Play Monster Girls Back to School

controls: Use your mouse to pick items.
content.howToPlay: You have six girls. Get them ready one by one.Start with Frankie and let your creativity flow as you choose the best outfit, hairstyle and accessories for her.Remember, after you pick an item, you're in control. Go back to the wardrobe menu and decide what you'd like to select next.When you're done with the look, hit the checkmark button. This button confirms your selection and allows you to move on to the next monster girl.
content.developer: FreezeNova Created Monster Girls Back to School game.

fullContent: Homeâ€º 1 PlayerMonster Girls Back to SchoolBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenAfter a long summer break, Monster Girls is Back to School finally. They have been missing each other all summer and collected lots of tea to spill on the first day of school.But first, they need to be sure they outshine on the first day of Monster High School. And who better to help them do that than you? Your role is crucial in preparing these 6 girls for the school from bottom to top.What is Monster Girls Back to School?Monster Girls Back to School is a dress-up game where players prepare gorgeous monster girls for the first day of school.The game celebrates acceptance and diversity in a high school. It has a strong message of even girls from fantastical monster families can be lovely and have meaningful friendships.ControlsUse your mouse to pick items.How to Play Monster Girls Back to SchoolYou have six girls. Get them ready one by one.Start with Frankie and let your creativity flow as you choose the best outfit, hairstyle and accessories for her.Remember, after you pick an item, you're in control. Go back to the wardrobe menu and decide what you'd like to select next.When you're done with the look, hit the checkmark button. This button confirms your selection and allows you to move on to the next monster girl.Wardrobe SectionsTops: Stylish tops to make a statement; crop tops, shirts and sweatshirtsBottoms: Trendy skirts, pants and tightsJackets: Cool outerwear for a fashionable lookSunglasses: Chic shades to complete the outfitBags: Fashionable backpacks and pursesHairstyles: French braids, top knot buns, ponytails, beach waves, and many moreStockings: Nice socks to match the outfitCommon: Hats, hairpins, and ribbonsOthers: Phones, mugs, earbuds, and notebooksNecklaces: Sparkling necklaces to accessorizeEarrings: Gorgeous earrings for the perfect touchWho are Monster Girls?Frankie Stein: Daughter of Frankenstein's Monster and his Bride.Draculaura: Daughter of Count Dracula.Clawdeen Wolf: Daughter of the Werewolf.Cleo de Nile: Daughter of the Mummy.Abbey Bominibale: Daughter of the YetiLagoona Blue: Daughter of the Sea Monster.DeveloperFreezeNova Created Monster Girls Back to School game.More Dress Up GamesIf you like witch dress-up games, why don't you play Weird Dance on Wednesday, prepare Wednesday, the gothic daughters of Addams Family next? Or perhaps you'd like to dress LOL Surprise OMG dolls in a style studio? We have every shade of fashion here. Pick a title, and let the show begin!This article was updated on July 12, 20241 Player2DDress UpFashionFreeGirlHTML5KidsMobileMouse
